# **26189680 | AvivRegev | Cell | 2015 | BMDCs | TNF**
## **Overview** 
**PMID**: 26189680<br />
**Model**: Bone marrow derived dendritic cells (BMDCs)<br />
**Treatment**: Tumor necrosis factor (TNF) high<br />
**Control**: Tumor necrosis factor (TNF) low<br />
**Type**: Sorting <br />
**Description**: CRISPR screen in mouse bone marrow derived dendritic cells (BMDCs) and sorted with TNF high vs. TNF low conditions. Positive values indicate genes whose knockout can increase TNF protein expression level<br />

## **Original Figures**

# **28813417 | MarkADawson | Nature | 2017 | BxPC-3 | PD-L1**
## **Overview**
**PMID**: 28813417<br />
**Model**: BxPC-3 (human pancreatic cancer cell line)<br />
**Treatment**: Sorting cells with PD-L1_low surface marker. Pretreated with or without interferon gamma<br />
**Control**: Input<br />
**Type**: Sorting<br />
**Description**: CRISPR screen in human pancreatic cancer cell line BxPC-3 and sorted with PD-L1 low conditions. Positive values indicate genes whose knockout can decrease PD-L1 protein expression level<br />

# **33271120 | JonathanWYewdell | Immunity | 2021 | BJAB | MHCI**
## **Overview**
**PMID**: 33271120<br />
**Model**: BJAB (human diffuse large B-cell lymphoma, DLBCL)<br />
**Treatment**: After CRISPR screen, BJAB cells were sorted two rounds with high level MHC-I-specific W6/32 antibody<br />
**Control**: Sorted with low level MHC-I-specific antibody<br />
**Type**: Sorting<br />
**Description**: CRISPR screen in human diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL) BJAB cells and sorted with MHC-I high vs. MHC-I low conditions. Positive values indicate genes whose knockout can increase MHC-I protein expression level<br />

# **33589424 | XShirleyLiu | CancerDiscov | 2021 |  B16F10 | MHCI.neg.reg+PDL1.neg.reg**
## **Overview**
**PMID**: 33589424<br />
**Model**: B16F10 (murine skin melanoma cell line)<br />
**Treatment**: Negative regulators screenings. B16F10 cells was pretreated with 10ng/ml IFNγ (high dose) followed by CRISPR screen, and then sorted with MHC-I.high PD-L1.high condition<br />
**Control**: Unsorted population<br />
**Type**: Sorting<br />
**Description**: CRISPR screen in high dose IFNγ pretreated mouse B16F10 cells and sorted with MHC-I.high PD-L1.high vs. unsorted population. Positive values indicate genes whose knockout can increase both MHC-I and PD-L1 protein expression level<br />

# **33589424 | XShirleyLiu | CancerDiscov | 2021 |  B16F10 | MHCI.pos.reg+PDL1.pos.reg**
## **Overview**
**PMID**: 33589424<br />
**Model**: B16F10 (murine skin melanoma cell line)<br />
**Treatment**: Positive regulators screenings. B16F10 cells was pretreated with 0.1ng/ml IFNγ (low dose) followed by CRISPR screen, and then sorted with MHC-I.low PD-L1.low condition<br />
